  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
    source_code: embed 
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```


```{r}
data("rest_inspec")

rest_inspec = 
  rest_inspec %>% 
  filter(boro == "MANHATTAN", cuisine_description == "Italian", zipcode == 10014, grade != "Not Yet Graded") 
```


Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
rest_inspec %>% 
  group_by(dba) %>% 
  mutate(
    text_label = str_c("Restaurant: ", dba, "\nStreet: ", street), grade = as.factor(grade), grade = fct_relevel(grade, "C", "B", "A")
  ) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~building, y = ~grade, type = "scatter", mode = "markers", text = ~ text_label, color= ~critical_flag, alpha = 0.5
  )
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
nyc_airbnb %>% 
  mutate(
    neighbourhood = fct_reorder(neighbourhood, price)
  ) %>% 
  plot_ly(y = ~price, color = ~neighbourhood, type = "box", colors = "viridis")
```

### Chart C

```{r}
nyc_airbnb %>% 
  count(neighbourhood) %>% 
  mutate(neighbourhood = fct_reorder(neighbourhood, n)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~neighbourhood, y = ~n, color = ~neighbourhood, type = "bar", colors = "viridis")
```
